name: if you didn't have an otp you have one now
name_original: if you didn't have an otp you have one now
description:
A romantic(?) game tainted with slight evil that will probably take less than 5 minutes to obtain both of 2 endings.

The third game in the IDK Project series.

Synopsis:

Romance is in the air - Cabin Roof Kid and Jeff go on their first date! But a problematic ex shows up. Yikes.

WARNINGS:

Contains death jokes, references to memes, talk of blood and murder, and has a teeny tad of relationship drama.
